objectives: Students will discuss education and learning using Expert/Academic register language
Students will engage with Sports/Competition themed scenarios related to education and learning
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of expert level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining education and learning content with Sports/Competition narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore education and learning through a Sports/Competition lens using Expert/Academic language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a competitive sports scenario involving education and learning

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice expert register vocabulary related to education and learning in a sports context
Students engage in sports themed role-play about education and learning using expert register
Students create original sports themed content about education and learning in expert register

discussion_questions: How would you describe education and learning in a Sports/Competition scenario?
What competition or victory might be involved in education and learning?
Can you create a Sports/Competition story about education and learning?
How does education and learning change when viewed through a Sports/Competition perspective?
What expert register expressions would you use to discuss this sports scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Sports/Competition situation involving education and learning
roles: Character A: Using expert register in sports context
Character B: Responding in expert register within sports theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Expert/Academic throughout: Scholarly, technical, high-level discourse
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Sports/Competition theme: Athletic challenges, competition, teamwork

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Expert/Academic register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Sports/Competition themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of expert register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
